SENT.plain: A familial cutis laxa syndrome is reported in a mother and son
In addition, the son had Klippel-Tranaunay-Weber syndrome, which may be related to his underlying disorder
Ultrastructural examination of skin revealed previously recognized abnormalities of elastic tissue
In addition, abnormalities in collagen structure are demonstrated
The underlying defect in this disorder appears to result in abnormalities in both elastic tissue and collagen structure
